org.obiba.opal.datashield.CustomRScriptM.script:
function (mod.glm.ds) {
X.mat<-as.matrix(mod.glm.ds$x) numsubs<-dim(X.mat)[1]
y.vect<-as.vector(mod.glm.ds$y)
lp.vect<-X.mat%*%mod.glm.ds$beta.vect
f<-mod.glm.ds$family
mu.vect<-f$linkinv(lp.vect) mu.eta.val<-f$mu.eta(lp.vect) var.vect<-f$variance(mu.vect) dev<-sum(f$dev.resids(y.vect, mu.vect, rep(1, length(y.vect))))
W.mat<-diag(as.vector(mu.eta.val^2/var.vect))
info.matrix<-t(X.mat)%*%W.mat%*%X.mat u.vect<-(y.vect-mu.vect)*1/var.vect score.vect<-t(X.mat)%*%W.mat%*%u.vect
list(family=f, info.matrix=info.matrix, score.vect=score.vect, numsubs=numsubs, dev=dev) }
